title: Congratulating the Garden City High School Girls Soccer Team and Coach Mike Heedles upon the occasion of winning the New York State Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION congratulating the Garden City High School Girls
Soccer Team and Coach Mike Heedles upon the occasion of winning the  New
York State Championship

WHEREAS,  Excellence  and  success in competitive sports can be achieved
only through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured  by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling  in  them  the  value  of teamwork, encouraging a standard of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS, The Garden City High School Girls Soccer  Team  are  the  New
York State Champions; with 1:26 left in the second overtime of the state
final, they went on to defeat Rye by a score of 2-1; and
  WHEREAS,  In  addition,  the Garden City High School Girls Soccer Team
are also Nassau County and Long Island Champions; and
  WHEREAS, The athletic talent displayed by this team is  due  in  great
part  to  the  efforts of Coach Mike Heedles and Assistant Coaches Scott
McAuley and Mark Quigle, skilled and inspirational tutors, respected for
their ability to develop potential into excellence; and
  WHEREAS, The team's  overall  record  is  outstanding,  and  the  team
members  were  loyally  and  enthusiastically supported by family, fans,
friends and the community at large; and
  WHEREAS, The hallmarks of the Garden City  High  School  Girls  Soccer
Team,  from the opening game of the season to participation in the cham-
pionship, were a sisterhood of athletic ability, of good  sportsmanship,
of  honor  and of scholarship, demonstrating that these team players are
second to none; and
  WHEREAS, Athletically and academically, the team members  have  proven
themselves to be an unbeatable combination of talents, reflecting favor-
ably on their school; and
  WHEREAS,  Recently  named  the New York State Coach of the Year, Coach
Mike Heedles has done a superb job in guiding, molding and inspiring the
team members toward their goals; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment, and Coach Mike Heedles and  these  outstanding  athletes
have  clearly made a contribution to the spirit of excellence which is a
tradition of their school; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate the Garden City High School Girls Soccer Team; its members:
Victoria  Aldrich,  Delsey  Attardi,  Niki  Berkery, Christina Cesarini,
Kristen Conboy, Erin Greiner,  Taylor  Hennig,  Catherine  Malhame,  Liz
Mahoney,  Christina  Mangels,  Paulette  Mohasci,  Amanda  Murolo, Haley
O'Hanlon, Srey Powers, Tracy Rendano, Michelle  Rotondo,  Lily  Schmitt,
Jessica Stein, Courtney Studdert, Liz Stutzman, Barbara Sullivan, Kelsey
Tierney,  Jill  Yoo,  and Alexandra Zebrowski; and Coaches Mike Heedles,
Scott McAuley and Mark Quigle, on their outstanding season  and  overall
team record; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  the  Garden  City  High School Girls Soccer Team and to the
aforementioned coaches.
